name: Absolute Western
description:
Yet another piece of my sound design and interactive music composition portfolio.

Ruthlessly kill every inhabitants in town in this Western hack n' slash. The game is one level long and exclusively exists as a musical and audio journey. All graphical assets and the hack n' slash game template were provided by Unity. I did add an ugly Music Slider in the inventory menu, for anyone interested in SFX's and the subtle reverb zones.

For the whole thing to work I had to delve a little deeper into the intricacies of C# and how it interacts with FMOD in Unity (remember I'm not a programmer, yet), especially, I wanted the Enemies to trigger the second part of the soundtrack. I made all  SFX's and the full-on blues soundtrack on Ableton (dat Rhodes sound !).

No known bugs for the time being.
